title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.2 - Awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.2 - Awards

State Regulations
(a) Each award
shall consist of a plaque and $5,000 in cash which the winning local government
shall award as a scholarship to a student planning a career in municipal
government. The purpose of the scholarship is to build local government
leadership for the future. (b) One
award each year shall be made in each of the following categories: (1)

Under 25,000 population. (2)
25,000 to 100,000 population. (3)

Over 100,000 population. (c) Awards shall be presented at
suitable ceremonies in January. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

810.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
